mapper.select: select e.bd_num, e.bd_title, e.bd_content, e.bd_hashTag, e.bd_location, d.mb_imgSrc, e.bd_regDate, e.bd_category, e.bd_status, d.mb_nickName, d.mb_sex, d.mb_birthDate from board e , member d where bd_category = '2' and bd_status = '1' and e.mb_id = d.mb_id order by bd_num DESC
mapper.insert: insert into board(bd_num, mb_id, bd_title, bd_content, bd_hashTag, bd_location, bd_category) values ((select NVL(max(bd_num),0)+1 from board where bd_category = '2'), #{mb_id}, #{bd_title}, #{bd_content}, #{bd_hashTag}, #{bd_location}, '2')
mapper.select: select d.mb_sex, d.mb_birthDate, d.mb_nickName, d.mb_imgSrc from board e , member d where e.mb_id = d.mb_id and bd_num = #{bd_num} and bd_category = '2' and bd_status = '1'
